title: Front-end Development
description: I specialize in front-end development, with a strong focus on the React ecosystem. I have the ability to quickly assimilate new technologies and incorporate them into my projects. Additionally, I'm familiar with the use of Git and various project management tools, which allows me to adapt easily.

title: UI Design
description: I have a keen eye for UI design and aim to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. To achieve this, I'm proficient with tools such as Figma, GIMP, and Blender.

title: Interactivity
description: I'm passionate about enhancing user experiences by adding animations and interactivity to my projects, making them more engaging and enjoyable. I study other websites to make interactions interesting for a wide audience, including people with disabilities.

title: Immersive Experiences
description: My goal is to work diligently to provide users with an enjoyable and immersive experience when they visit a website. I believe in creating websites that captivate and delight users. I'm eager to explore ThreeJS, even though I'm still a beginner.

title: Features
description: I greatly appreciate the Python language, especially the newcomer: MOJO. Mojo is a programming language developed by Modular IA, an AI infrastructure company founded by Chris Lattner. It is designed to meet the specific needs of developers in the fields of artificial intelligence, automation, and embedded systems.
